alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 4:21AM MST until November 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. New snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches over the south end of the Absaroka Range. Accumulations of 2 to 5 inches over the north with 1 to 2 inches in the Wapiti and South Fork valleys. Southwest wind gusting 25 to 35 mph above 8000 feet. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Outdoor enthusiasts should expect the combination of snow and wind to make for difficult travel in the backcountry.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
